text: hello everyone I'm Robin long time no
see it's been a long time since we
uploaded a new English video I'm sorry
but I'm very thankful to all of our fans
who have been sending comments and
messages and emails you make us very
happy thank you also you make us want to
make some new English videos so that's
our plan here at Shaw English we are
planning to make a new series of English
videos but before we make the series we
would like to hear from you what kind of
videos are you interested in seeing on
Shaw English so please let us know what
kind of videos you want to learn English
from you can leave a comment below or
you can send an email all right thank
you very much see you soon
